paragraph: Call or text the contact number for a consultation

detailsData.title: Experienced Attorneys
detailsData.content: Each Attorney has over 30+ years of legal experience. UCLA Graduates.

detailsData.title: Provide Excellence
detailsData.content: We provide personal and sound legal advice to our Clients.

detailsData.title: Attorneys on Retainer
detailsData.content: Our Attorneys offer Clients legal advice and provide them with information and resources to make legal and business decisions.

valueProp: The Fritz Law Offices advises businesses from start-up to retirement and everything in-between, as part of the Client's business plan for success. We provide Employment Law & HR support to Employers and Non-Profit Organizations.

testimonalData.text: Theresa Fritz has been La Tortilla Factory's Family Business HR attorney for over 25 years. Theresa has always been accessible, quick to respond, and knowledgeable in the ever-changing HR arena.
testimonalData.author: Carlos Tamayo

testimonalData.text: Fritz Law Offices has been of invaluable help to our small business. Since 2018 the Fritz team has been available to support us, keep us informed on all our HR and general legal practices to correctly follow CA Law.
testimonalData.author: Angela Pryor, General Manager & Managing Member

testimonalData.text: For a wide range of HR issues, we can always count on Theresa Fritz and Fritz Law Offices to provide clear, complete, accurate, and timely advice.
testimonalData.author: Jeff Nathanson, Executive Director
